alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 31 at 2:03PM MDT until March 31 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Jackson County and Bennett County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
